SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountSaver
Interface to ensure that a class implementing it has the method for saving an account.
Administrator
The class represents a administrator member involved in managing staff and inventory.
Appointment
Represents an appointment between a doctor and a patient.
AppointmentHandler
Handles the management of appointments in the system, including scheduling, rescheduling, viewing, recording, and canceling appointments.
AppointmentManagement
Provides various methods for managing appointments and handles between the interaction between the user and system This class interacts with AppointmentHandler and StaffHandler for functionality.
BillingRecordManagement
Provides methods to manage and display billing records, including viewing past appointment outcomes and handling payment processes for patients.
CSVHandler
Utility class for handling reading and writing of CSV files.
DateAndTime
Interface that provides utility methods for validating date and time formats and ranges.
Doctor
Represents a doctor in the system who can manage their schedule and view appointments, and handle patient medical records and certificates.
HospitalApp
Main entry point for the hospital management application.
InventoryHandler
Handles inventory-related tasks such as saving replenishment requests to a CSV file.
InventoryManagement
Provides functionality for managing the inventory of medicines, including viewing, updating stock levels and handling replenishment requests.
LoginHandler
Handles user login and authentication for the hospital management system.
Manageable
Interface to ensure that a class implementing it has the methods for managing staff.
MedicalCertificate
Represents a medical certificate issued to a patient, containing details such as the reason, duration, issue date, and approval status.
MedicalCertificateHandler
Handles the operations related to managing medical certificates, including loading, saving, viewing, and updating their statuses.
MedicalRecordManagement
Provides functionality to view and update patient medical records.
Medicine
Represents a medicine in the inventory, including its name, current stock, and the low stock alert threshold.
MedicineHandler
Handles the loading and saving of the medicine list from and to a CSV file.
PasswordHash
Provides a method for hashing passwords using the SHA-256 algorithm.
Patient
Represents a patient in the hospital management system.
PatientHandler
Handles operations related to managing patient data, such as loading, saving, and retrieving patients.
Pharmacist
Represents a pharmacist in the hospital management system.
StaffHandler
Handles operations related to managing staff data, such as loading, saving, adding, and removing staff members.
StaffManager
This class provides functionality for administrators to manage hospital staff, including adding, removing, viewing, and filtering staff by role, gender, and age.
TextHandler
Utility class for reading from and writing to text files.
User
This class serves as the base for different types of users, such as patient, doctor, pharmacist and administrators.
